MailFinder is the most advanced Email Finder fully integrated into Gmail. Imagine the power of searching any email directly in your Gmail account?! That exactly what our email finder do!

🔍 Find any email addresses

Find anyone's email address directly from your Gmail account using our email finder tool. Our platform is the most advanced in searching for professional email addresses, and we have seamlessly integrated this technology into Gmail for your convenience.

✅ Verify any email addresses

Verify any email address with our email checker directly from your Gmail account. Our Email Verifier is designed to provide you with accurate and fast email verification for any email address. Ensure that all your emails land in the inbox and maintain the protection of your deliverability.

🏢 Find all company email addresses

Find email addresses associated with any company name effortlessly with our powerful email finder. Our tool can quickly locate email addresses based on the company name, allowing you to find all the contacts of any company with just one click. The domain search is fully integrated into Gmail, enabling you to swiftly discover the right contact person within a company that you would like to reach out to.

🛰️ Email finder with Hunter.io

Our partnership with Hunter.io has resulted in the creation of an exceptional email finder tool. Accessible directly within Gmail, it combines email formats, web-found addresses, and verification status to deliver reliable contact information in seconds. Connect with professionals effortlessly using the best email finder on the web.

⭐️ Free email search

MailFinder offers a 100% free email finder with up to 5 free email searches per month! Each month, your credit will be reset to zero so you can enjoy the benefits of our email finder for free again.

💥 Premium versions

Our Premium version offers an unlimited number of email searches, verifier and company search per month for only $99 per year!

---

💡 What is an email finder?

An email finder is a platform that can discover the email addresses of professionals. Our Email Finder is based 100% on the technologies of Hunter.io.

💡 How to find email addresses with the Email Finder?

To use our Email Find service to locate an email address, simply input the recipient's full name and their company or domain name. Our Email finder will search our databases of over one hundred million professional email addresses to provide you with the most current contact information available for any professional.

💡 What is the accuracy of Hunter's Email Finder?

Using a vast database of public email addresses, the Email Finder locates accurate contact information. Before being provided, all email addresses undergo a free verification process. Only email addresses with a green Verified shield have been confirmed as deliverable and can be used with confidence. For those email addresses that couldn't be validated, a confidence score is provided based on several data points to determine their likelihood of accuracy.

💡 How MailFinder work with Gmail?

The power of MailFinder is its ability to integrate the best Email Finder on the web and combine it with a powerful integration to Gmail. You no longer need to switch to another tab if you need to search for an email address. Our Email Finder is available directly in your Gmail composer.

To use it, simply start writing an email as usual, click on Email Finder, and in one click, search for the professional email addresses of your recipient.
